name: Lupina
description: Gods. Without them, there would be no order. And no order would mean chaos. That is the current state of our world as we know it. Terrible terrors emerging on each corner of the globe, and no one to help. One of the God’s messengers was assigned to deliver a letter to summon heaven’s mightiest angel to help with the global crisis. The letter, however, fell from the heavens, and onto Hell’s dumbest demon, Lupina.
